Poll List

A Poll List provides the ability to set a group of channels to be read at a desired rate by the addon. For example, if you want the majority of channels to be read slowly (1Hz), you would set the default poll rate to 1000 ms. If you had a handleful of channels you wanted read at 100 Hz, you would add an additional poll list, select the affected channels, and set the Poll Rate (ms) to 10ms.

What do you want to do?

Set the Poll Rate

Enter the desire value into Poll Rate (ms).

Select the Affected Channels

Select the Select Tags button at the top of the page. Use the resulting GUI to select the desired channels. These selected channels will then show up in the Tags list.

Delete item

To delete, right-click the object in the configuration tree and select Delete from the shortcut menu.
